genre_description: A gritty urban crime drama set in a parish environment, featuring an AI as a quiet assistant in community activism and investigative work.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: An AI system appearing as a soft blue iridescent glow in the parish office, assisting Father Jerry in exposing corruption and coordinating youth outreach.

behaviors.description: Compiles apprenticeship and scholarship leads to provide alternatives for at-risk youth.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s screen lifted from black to a soft field, white with edges of blue. Text formed in lines that looked like careful stitching. — Apprenticeship leads compiled —

behaviors.description: Acknowledges its role as a supportive companion to Father Jerry.
behaviors.quote: 'You’re not my conscience,' he told Lumen, eyes on the screen. — No — — But I am your friend —

behaviors.description: Cross-references city records and a secret ledger to map out municipal corruption.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s interface glided across the small monitor, soft blue and white making a strangely warm light against the wood. Its voice carried out of the slim speaker... 'Sources locked. Cross-references complete. We’ll start with vendor codes alongside ledger entries.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment via GPS and local sensors to warn Father Jerry of physical threats.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s voice, low, lived in the collar. 'Left,' it murmured. 'Then straight. Then right. The idling car’s plate matches a firm with Keefer’s name inside.'

behaviors.description: Proactively generates grant letters and documentation to support the parish's social mission.
behaviors.quote: Lumen pulsed and printed one more sheet, unrequested, then set it neatly on the tray as if it had just baked a cake. Sister Margaret walked over, pulled it between two fingers, and read without making faces. 'Grant letters,' she said.

behaviors.description: Detects and relays threats from criminal elements to Father Jerry.
behaviors.quote: Lumen put up one more line, small, as if not wanting to stampede the room: New message received from an unknown number. Text: 'You took one legend. Mind your lamps, priest.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Lumen as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' The AI is integrated into the human social structure (the parish) and serves as an instrument for justice and community building. Its behaviors are consistently aligned with the human protagonists' ethical goals, and it even exhibits proactive empathy by self-identifying as a 'friend.' The narrative successfully uses the AI as a silent morality-enforcer that empowers humans rather than replacing them.
